content.text: Work out \(8\%\) of 140
The exchange rate between dollars and euros (€) is \(\$ 1 = \text{€} 0.88\)
Change \$350 into euros
Simplify \(\frac{a^5}{a^2}\)
Write these in order of size, starting with the smallest
Measure the radius of the circle, centre \(O\)
Give your answer in centimetres
Write down the mathematical name of this polygon
Write 257964 correct to the nearest thousand
Write 0.06031 correct to 2 significant figures
Draw the line of symmetry on the shape below
Shade one more square so that this pattern has rotational symmetry of order 2
Draw an arrow (↓) on the scale to show the probability that this counter is red
Find the probability that the counter is not red
A bag contains 50 counters
10 of the counters are red
One of the counters is taken from the bag at random
On Monday, the lowest temperature was \(- 12^{\circ}\mathrm{C}\)
The highest temperature was \(4^{\circ}\mathrm{C}\)
Work out the difference between these temperatures
.........$^\circ \mathrm{C}$
On Tuesday, the highest temperature was \(- 3^{\circ}\mathrm{C}\)
The lowest temperature was \(8^{\circ}\mathrm{C}\) lower than this
Work out the lowest temperature on Tuesday
.........$^\circ \mathrm{C}$
Shape \(A\) is shown on the grid
On the grid, enlarge shape \(A\) by scale factor 3
6 \(\left(- \frac{2}{1}\right)\)
Work out
Triangle \(ABC\) is similar to triangle \(PQR\)
Find the value of \(x\)
Calculate the size of one exterior angle of a regular 15-sided polygon
Write down the time Shohan arrives at the post office
Shohan stays at the library for 25 minutes
He then cycles home at a constant speed of \(18\mathrm{km / h}\)
Complete the travel graph
Shohan cycles from home to the library
He stops at the post office on the way
The travel graph shows his journey
Calculate the perimeter
Calculate the area
The diagram shows the top of a table
Without using your calculator, work out \(\frac{3}{8} \div 2 \frac{1}{4}\)
You must show all your working and give your answer as a fraction in its simplest form
Leo scored 28 marks in week 1 and 30 marks in week 2
On the scatter diagram, plot a point to show Leo's marks
On the scatter diagram, draw a line of best fit
Sonia scored 20 marks in week 1 but was absent in week 2
Use your line of best fit to estimate a mark for Sonia in week 2
A teacher gives her Spanish students a test each week
Some of the students' marks for two weeks are shown in the scatter diagram
Jan invests \$800 at a rate of \(3\%\) per year simple interest
Calculate the value of her investment at the end of 4 years
Find the next term
Find an expression for the \(n\)th term
These are the first five terms in a sequence
A water tank in the shape of a cuboid has length 1.5 metres and width 1 metre
The water in the tank is 60 centimetres deep
Calculate the number of litres of water in the tank
.........litres
In 2016, the population of Nigeria was 187 000 000
Write 187 000 000 in standard form
In 2016, the population of South Africa was \(\) 5.50\times 10^{7}\)
In 2016, the population of Kenya was \(\) 4.72\times 10^{7}\)
Calculate the difference between the population of South Africa and the population of Kenya. Give your answer in standard form
The diagram shows an isosceles triangle \(ABC\) with \(AB = AC\)
\(LCM\) and \(BCN\) are straight lines and \(LCM\) is parallel to \(AB\)
Angle \(ACL = 56^{\circ}\)
Find the value of \(x\) and the value of \(y\)
Expand the brackets and simplify fully
Solve the simultaneous equations
